title: Isebenza njani-iTempile ye-Orbital
heading: Ingaba isebenza kanjani
intro: Iprojekthi yeTempile ye-Orbital iqulethe izinto ezintathu ezidibeneyo ezisebenzisanayo ukuthumela amagama kwitempile kwindawo.
paragraph1: Isathelayithi ijikeleza umhlaba kumphakamo omalunga neekhilomitha ezingama-525, igcina amagama kwinkumbulo yayo. Izikhululo ezisezantsi zinxibelelana nesathelayithi ngexesha lokudlula kwayo, zithumela amagama abantu abawafakileyo ngewebhusayithi.
paragraph2: Xa ufaka igama, lidibanisa umgca kwaye liza kuthunyelwa kwisathelayithi ngexesha lokudlula elilandelayo elikhoyo. Uya kufumana isiqinisekiso se-imeyile xa igama lakho lifakwe ngempumelelo kwi-Orbital Temple.
